evidence: Agreement relations that cross statistical phrase boundaries are not explicitly modeled in most phrasebased MT systems ( Avramidis and Koehn , 2008 We address this shortcoming with an agreement model that scores sequences of fine-grained morphosyntactic classes .
text: Agreement relations that cross statistical phrase boundaries are not explicitly modeled in most phrasebased MT systems ( Avramidis and Koehn , 2008 We address this shortcoming with an agreement model that scores sequences of fine-grained morphosyntactic classes .
